subject: Hello dear,
body:
Hello dear,
Once again and for the very last time, I am Diplomat John Paul, I am
mandated to deliver a parcel containing an ATM CARD{$1.2 M} to you by
the WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION {W.H.O.}
I want to use the Post office medium to send you your parcel and
 to
register and post your parcel to your given address, will cost you the
sum of $50, I therefore suggests that you send the $50 us through an
iTunes card or an y other Gift card to enable me send you your parcel
through the post office. 
 But if you can send the money through,
    1. Western Union, Money gram, RIA, World Remit
    2. Gift card
    3. Bank transfer
you should let me know so that I will give you the information to pay in.
I also want you to reconfirm your full delivery address to me once
again to avoid wrong delivery.
1. Your Name
2. House/delivery address/country
3. Phone number
4. Age
5
. Any identification
6. Nearest Airport
Kindly do this immediately you receive this message so that I can
proceed to the post office immediately and send your parcel to you as
soon as possible.
I await your urgent response but if you are not interested in
receiving the parcel, please do not reply back.
Yoursa
Diplomat John Paul.
+234-906-7795-854
URGENT RESPONSE NEEDED. Reply to this e-mail(
diplomatjohnpaul31@outlook.com
 )Call / WhatsApp ( (+234-906-7795-854 )

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your efforts in delivering the parcel containing an ATM CARD on behalf of the WORLD HEALTH organization. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

Could you please provide more details about the contents of the parcel? It would be helpful to know what exactly is inside the ATM CARD.

Also, I'm curious about why there is a need for me to send money through a gift card or other means. Can you explain why this is necessary?

Lastly, could you clarify how long it will take for the parcel to reach me once I provide my delivery address?

I look forward to your response and further instructions.

Best wishes,
Marilyn
